# Janitorial Services - RCMP Punnichy Detachment

## Official Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: M5000-24-5622/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: Saturday, April 8, 2024, at 4:00 PM (CST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date**: TBA

### Description of Services Required

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for the RCMP Punnichy Detachment, located in Punnichy, Saskatchewan. The contract period will be for two years with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to maintain the facility in a clean and safe condition.

### Important Event Dates

* March 7, 2024: Tender publication date
* April 8, 2024: Tender closing date
* May 8, 2024: Expected approval for contract extension (if applicable)

### Evaluation Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of price. The lowest-priced compliant bid will be recommended for award of a contract. The contractor's ability to meet the security requirements of the contract will also be assessed.

### Security Requirements

This solicitation contains a security requirement. The contractor must be able to provide adequate security measures to ensure the safe operation of the facility.

### Bidding Process

This is an open tender, but it will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids from certified Indigenous businesses are received.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Important Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Debbie McPherson
* **Contact Email**: [debbie.mcpherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.mcpherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone Number**: (639) 625-3567

### Supporting Documents

The tender documents, including the Invitation to Tender and Annex A - Janitorial Services, are available for download from the Canada Buys website.

### Language

The tender documents may be submitted in either English or French.
